verses.roman:
"ataḥpara āra nā kariha punar-bāra
etāvatā vāñchā-pūraṇa kariluṅ tomāra"

synonyms: ataḥpara—hereafter; āra—any more; nā kariha—do not do; punaḥ-bāra—again; etāvatā—so far; vāñchā-pūraṇa—fulfilling the desire; kariluṅ—I have done; tomāra—of you.
translation: "Do not act in this way any more. I have fulfilled your desire as far as possible."
